feed.title: Cody Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Cody news and events.

entry.title: Launching the New Cody Documentation Site
entry.summary:
Today I'm happy to introduce the new documentation site for Cody!
The site is built using Facebook's newly released [Docusaurus](https://docusaurus.io/) tool for building documentation websites.
The intention is to have a place for both end-user do
